messages.content: Calculate the circumference of a circle.

function.name: geometry_circumference
function.description: Calculate the circumference of a circle given the radius.

units.description: Units for the output circumference measurement. Default is 'cm'.

messages.content: Calculate the area of a circle.

function.name: geometry_calculate_area_circle
function.description: Calculate the area of a circle given its radius.

unit.description: The measurement unit of the radius (optional parameter, default is 'units').

messages.content: Calculate the area of a right-angled triangle given the length of its height as 10cm.

function.name: calculate_area
function.description: Calculate the area of a right-angled triangle given the lengths of its base and height.

base.description: The length of the base of the right-angled triangle.

height.description: The height of the right-angled triangle.

unit.description: The unit of measure used. Defaults to cm.

messages.content: Solve a quadratic equation where b=6 and c=5.

function.name: solve_quadratic_equation
function.description: Function solves the quadratic equation and returns its roots.

c.description: Constant term in the quadratic equation

messages.content: Calculate the factorial using math functions.

function.name: math_factorial
function.description: Calculate the factorial of a given number.

number.description: The number for which factorial needs to be calculated.

messages.content: What is the area of a triangle with a base of 10 units?

function.name: calculate_triangle_area
function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle using its base and height.

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

height.description: The height of the triangle from the base.

messages.content: Find the area of a triangle with a base of 10 units.

function.name: calculate_triangle_area
function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle given its base and height.

unit.description: The unit of measure (defaults to 'units' if not specified)

messages.content: Calculate the derivative of the function.

function.name: calculate_derivative
function.description: Calculate the derivative of a polynomial function.
The polynomial function.

x_value.description: The x-value at which the derivative is calculated. Optional, if not given, the function will return a function of the derivative instead of a specific value.

messages.content: What's the area of a circle?

function.name: geometry_area_circle
function.description: Calculate the area of a circle given the radius.

units.description: The units in which the radius is measured (defaults to meters).

messages.content: Find the roots of a quadratic equation given coefficients b = -11, and c = -4.

function.name: solve_quadratic
function.description: Solve a quadratic equation given coefficients a, b, and c. If optional 'root_type' is 'real', the function will only return real roots. If not specified, function may return complex roots.

a.description: The coefficient of the squared term in the quadratic equation.

b.description: The coefficient of the linear term in the quadratic equation.

c.description: The constant term in the quadratic equation.

root_type.description: The type of roots to return: 'real' for real roots, 'all' for both real and complex roots. This parameter is optional.

messages.content: What is the circumference of a circle?

function.name: calculate_circumference
function.description: Calculates the circumference of a circle with a given radius.

radius.description: The radius of the circle in the unit given.

unit.description: The unit of measurement for the radius. Default is cm.

messages.content: What are the roots of the quadratic equation where a=2 and b=5?

function.name: solve_quadratic
function.description: Find the roots of a quadratic equation. Returns both roots.

messages.content:
Original query: "Calculate the area under the curve y=x^2 from x=1 to x=3."

Calculate the area under the curve y=x^2.

function.name: calculate_area_under_curve
function.description: Calculate the area under a mathematical function within a given interval.
The mathematical function as a string.

interval.description: An array that defines the interval to calculate the area under the curve from the start to the end point.

method.description: The numerical method to approximate the area under the curve. The default value is 'trapezoidal'.

messages.content: Find the prime factors.

function.name: number_analysis_prime_factors
function.description: Compute the prime factors of a number.

messages.content: Find the Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) of 36.

function.name: number_theory_gcd
function.description: Compute the greatest common divisor of two given integers.

messages.content: Calculate the greatest common divisor of the number 50.

function.name: math_gcd
function.description: Compute the greatest common divisor of two numbers

messages.content: Find the highest common factor of 36.

function.name: math_hcf
function.description: Calculate the highest common factor of two numbers.

messages.content: Calculate the velocity of a car that travels a distance of 50 kilometers.

function.name: calculate_velocity
function.description: Calculate the velocity for a certain distance travelled within a specific duration.

distance.description: The distance travelled by the object, typically in kilometers.

duration.description: The duration of the journey, typically in hours.

unit.description: Optional parameter. The unit to return the velocity in. If not provided, the default is km/h.

messages.content: Find the greatest common divisor (GCD) of 12.

function.name: math_gcd
function.description: Calculate the greatest common divisor of two integers.

messages.content: Calculate the final velocity of an object, knowing that it started from rest and accelerated at a rate of 9.8 m/sÂ².

function.name: calculate_final_velocity
function.description: Calculate the final velocity of an object under constant acceleration, knowing its initial velocity, acceleration, and time of acceleration.

initial_velocity.description: The initial velocity of the object.

messages.content: Find an all vegan restaurant that opens until at least 11 PM.

function.name: vegan_restaurant_find_nearby
function.description: Locate nearby vegan restaurants based on specific criteria like operating hours.

location.description: The city and state, e.g. New York, NY, you should format it as City, State.

operating_hours.description: Preferred latest closing time of the restaurant. E.g. if 11 is given, then restaurants that close at or after 11 PM will be considered. This is in 24 hour format.

messages.content: Find the shortest driving distance from New York City.

function.name: get_shortest_driving_distance
function.description: Calculate the shortest driving distance between two locations.

origin.description: Starting point of the journey. You should format it as city name like Boston.

destination.description: End point of the journey. You should format it as city name like Boston.

unit.description: Preferred unit of distance (optional, default is kilometers).

messages.content: Calculate the magnetic field produced at the center of a circular loop with a radius of 4 meters.

function.name: calculate_magnetic_field
function.description: Calculate the magnetic field produced at the center of a circular loop carrying current.

current.description: The current through the circular loop in Amperes.

radius.description: The radius of the circular loop in meters.

permeability.description: The magnetic permeability. Default is permeability in free space.

messages.content: What is the final speed of an object dropped from rest if we neglect air resistance?

function.name: calculate_final_speed
function.description: Calculate the final speed of an object in free fall after a certain time, neglecting air resistance. The acceleration due to gravity is considered as -9.81 m/s^2

initial_speed.description: The initial speed of the object in m/s. Default is 0 for an object at rest.

time.description: The time in seconds for which the object is in free fall.

gravity.description: The acceleration due to gravity. Default is -9.81 m/s^2.

messages.content: Calculate the electric field at a point 3 meters away.

function.name: calculate_electric_field
function.description: Calculate the electric field produced by a charge at a certain distance.

charge.description: Charge in coulombs producing the electric field.

distance.description: Distance from the charge in meters where the field is being measured.

permitivity.description: Permitivity of the space where field is being calculated, default is for vacuum.

messages.content: Calculate the resonant frequency of an LC circuit given a capacitance of 100ÂµF.

function.name: calculate_resonant_frequency
function.description: Calculate the resonant frequency of an LC (inductor-capacitor) circuit.

round_off.description: Rounding off the result to a certain decimal places, default is 2.

messages.content: Calculate the electric field strength 4 meters away in a vacuum.

function.name: calculate_electric_field_strength
function.description: Calculate the electric field strength at a certain distance from a point charge.

distance.description: The distance from the charge in meters.

medium.description: The medium in which the charge and the point of calculation is located. Default is 'vacuum'.

messages.content: Calculate the magnetic field strength 10 meters away from a long wire.

function.name: calculate_magnetic_field_strength
function.description: Calculate the magnetic field strength at a point a certain distance away from a long wire carrying a current.

current.description: The current flowing through the wire in Amperes.

distance.description: The perpendicular distance from the wire to the point where the magnetic field is being calculated.

permeability.description: The permeability of the medium. Default is 4Ï x 10^-7 (Vacuum Permeability).

messages.content: Get directions to Melbourne using the fastest route.

function.name: get_directions
function.description: Retrieve directions from one location to another.

start_location.description: The starting point of the journey.

end_location.description: The destination point of the journey.

route_type.description: Type of route to use (e.g., fastest, scenic). Default is fastest.

messages.content: What is the density of a substance with a mass of 45 kg?

function.name: calculate_density
function.description: Calculate the density of a substance based on its mass and volume.

mass.description: The mass of the substance in kilograms.

volume.description: The volume of the substance in cubic meters.

unit.description: The unit of density. Default is kg/mÂ³

messages.content: Calculate the entropy change for a certain process given a final temperature of 400K and a heat capacity of 5J/K.

function.name: calculate_entropy_change
function.description: Calculate the entropy change for an isothermal and reversible process.

isothermal.description: Whether the process is isothermal. Default is True.

messages.content: Retrieve the sequence of a DNA molecule in the 'fasta' format.

function.name: fetch_DNA_sequence
function.description: Retrieve the sequence of a DNA molecule with the given id from a public database.

DNA_id.description: Unique ID of the DNA molecule in the database.

format.description: Optional parameter to get sequence in specific format (default to 'fasta').

upstream.description: Optional parameter to include certain number of base pairs upstream the DNA sequence (default to 0).

messages.content: Identify the protein sequence of a given human gene.

function.name: get_protein_sequence
function.description: Retrieve the protein sequence encoded by a human gene.

species.description: The species for which the gene is to be analyzed.

messages.content: Calculate the cell density in a sample where the experiment dilution is 5 times.

function.name: calculate_cell_density
function.description: Calculate the cell density of a biological sample based on its optical density and the experiment dilution.

optical_density.description: The optical density of the sample, usually obtained from a spectrophotometer reading.

dilution.description: The dilution factor applied during the experiment.

calibration_factor.description: The calibration factor to adjust the density, default value is 1e9 assuming cell density is in CFU/mL.

messages.content: What are the names of proteins?

function.name: cellbio_get_proteins
function.description: Get the list of proteins in a specific cell compartment.

include_description.description: Set true if you want a brief description of each protein.

messages.content: Find the type of gene mutation based on species Homo sapiens.

function.name: mutation_type_find
function.description: Finds the type of a genetic mutation based on its SNP (Single Nucleotide Polymorphism) ID.

snp_id.description: The ID of the Single Nucleotide Polymorphism (SNP) mutation.

species.description: Species in which the SNP occurs, default is 'Homo sapiens' (Humans).

messages.content: Predict whether a person with height 5ft 10in who is lightly active will get type 2 diabetes.

function.name: diabetes_prediction
function.description: Predict the likelihood of diabetes type 2 based on a person's weight and height.

weight.description: Weight of the person in lbs.

height.description: Height of the person in inches.

activity_level.description: Physical activity level of the person.

messages.content: Analyze the DNA sequence 'AGTCGATCGAACGTACGTACG' for mutations.

function.name: analyze_dna_sequence
function.description: Analyzes the DNA sequence based on a reference sequence and return any potential mutations.

sequence.description: The DNA sequence to be analyzed.

mutation_type.description: Type of the mutation to be looked for in the sequence.

messages.content: "Calculate the Population Density for Brazil in 2022 if the land area is 8.5 million square kilometers.

function.name: calculate_density
function.description: Calculate the population density of a specific country in a specific year.

country.description: The country for which the density needs to be calculated.

year.description: The year in which the density is to be calculated.

land_area.description: The land area of the country in square kilometers.

messages.content: Get me data on average precipitation for the last six months.

function.name: ecology_data_precipitation_stats
function.description: Retrieve precipitation data for a specified location and time period.

location.description: The name of the location, e.g., 'Amazon rainforest'.

time_frame.description: The time period for which data is required.

messages.content: Identify a small bird in a forest.

function.name: identify_bird
function.description: Identify a bird species based on certain characteristics.

messages.content: "Determine the annual carbon emissions produced by a vehicle driving 1500 miles.

function.name: calculate_vehicle_emission
function.description: Calculate the annual carbon emissions produced by a specific type of vehicle based on mileage.

vehicle_type.description: The type of vehicle. 'gas' refers to a gasoline vehicle, 'diesel' refers to a diesel vehicle, and 'EV' refers to an electric vehicle.

miles_driven.description: The number of miles driven per year.

emission_factor.description: Optional emission factor to calculate emissions. Default factor is set for gas vehicles

messages.content: What's the projected population growth in the next 20 years?

function.name: population_projections
function.description: Calculates the projected population growth based on the current growth rate.

country.description: The country for which to calculate the population projection.

years.description: Number of years for the projection.

growth_rate.description: Optional parameter to specify the growth rate. Default is current growth rate.

messages.content: Calculate the expected evolutionary fitness of a creature with trait A contributing to 40% of the fitness and trait B contributing 60%.

function.name: calculate_fitness
function.description: Calculate the expected evolutionary fitness of a creature based on the individual values and contributions of its traits.

trait_values.description: List of trait values, which are decimal numbers between 0 and 1, where 1 represents the trait maximally contributing to fitness.

trait_contributions.description: List of the percentage contributions of each trait to the overall fitness, which must sum to 1.

messages.content: Estimate the population size of elephants in the next 5 years given the current growth rate of 0.015.

function.name: elephant_population_estimate
function.description: Estimate future population of elephants given current population and growth rate.

growth_rate.description: The annual population growth rate of elephants.

years.description: The number of years to project the population.

messages.content: Find a nearby restaurant that serves vegan food.

function.name: restaurant_find_nearby
function.description: Locate nearby restaurants based on specific dietary preferences.

location.description: The city and state, e.g. Los Angeles, CA

messages.content: What is the function of ATP synthase?

function.name: cell_biology_function_lookup
function.description: Look up the function of a given molecule in a specified organelle.

specific_function.description: If set to true, a specific function of the molecule within the organelle will be provided, if such information exists.

messages.content: Calculate the average.

function.name: calculate_average
function.description: Calculates the average of a list of numbers.

numbers.description: The list of numbers to calculate the average of.

messages.content: Find the fastest route to Los Angeles with toll roads avoided.

function.name: map_routing_fastest_route
function.description: Finds the fastest route from one location to another, with an option to avoid toll roads.

start_location.description: The starting location for the journey.

avoid_tolls.description: Option to avoid toll roads during the journey.

messages.content: Find 5 restaurants nearby my location offering Thai food and a vegan menu.

function.name: find_restaurants
function.description: Locate nearby restaurants based on location and food preferences.

dietary_requirements.description: Special dietary requirements, e.g. vegan, gluten-free.

messages.content: What's the approximate distance from Boston, MA in miles?

function.name: geo_distance_calculate
function.description: Calculate the geographic distance between two given locations.

start_location.description: The starting location for the distance calculation. Specify the location in the format of City, State.

end_location.description: The destination location for the distance calculation. Specify the location in the format of City, State.

units.description: Optional. The desired units for the resulting distance ('miles' or 'kilometers'). Defaults to 'miles'.

messages.content: Retrieve Personal Info and Job History data of a specific employee in company 'ABC Ltd.'

function.name: employee_fetch_data
function.description: Fetches the detailed data for a specific employee in a given company.

employee_id.description: The unique ID of the employee.

data_field.description: Fields of data to be fetched for the employee (Optional).

messages.content: Update my customer information with user id 43523 in the database.

function.name: update_user_info
function.description: Update user information in the database.

user_id.description: The user ID of the customer.

database.description: The database where the user's information is stored.

messages.content: Calculate the area of a triangle with height 3m.

function.name: calc_area_triangle
function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle with the formula area = 0.5 * base * height.

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle in meters.

height.description: The perpendicular height of the triangle from the base to the opposite vertex in meters.

messages.content: Calculate the BMI (Body Mass Index) of a person who weighs 70kg.

function.name: calculate_BMI
function.description: Calculate the Body Mass Index (BMI) given a person's weight and height.

weight_kg.description: The weight of the person in kilograms.

height_m.description: The height of the person in meters.

messages.content: Calculate the factorial of a given number.

function.name: math_factorial
function.description: Calculate the factorial of a given number.

messages.content: Calculate the speed of an object in km/h if it traveled 450 meters.

function.name: calculate_speed
function.description: Calculate the speed of an object based on the distance travelled and the time taken.

distance.description: The distance the object travelled in meters.

time.description: The time it took for the object to travel in seconds.

to_unit.description: The unit in which the speed should be calculated, default is m/s.

messages.content: How much time will it take for the light to reach Earth from a star?

function.name: light_travel_time
function.description: Calculate the time taken for light to travel from a celestial body to another.

distance_in_light_years.description: The distance between the two celestial bodies in light years.

speed_of_light.description: The speed of light in vacuum, in m/s. Default value is 299792458 m/s.

messages.content: Calculate the area of a triangle with a base of 6.

function.name: geometry_area_triangle
function.description: Calculate the area of a triangle.

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

height.description: The height of the triangle from the base.

unit.description: The measurement unit for the area. Defaults to square meters.

messages.content: Calculate the power of 3 raised to an unspecified exponent.

function.name: math_power
function.description: Calculate the power of one number raised to another.

mod.description: The modulus. Default is None. Calculates pow(base, exponent) % mod when provided.

messages.content: Calculate the Body Mass Index for a person with a weight of 70 kg.

function.name: calculate_bmi
function.description: Calculate the Body Mass Index (BMI) for a person based on their weight and height.

weight.description: The weight of the person in kilograms.

height.description: The height of the person in centimeters.

system.description: The system of units to be used, 'metric' or 'imperial'. Default is 'metric'.

messages.content: Generate a random forest model with 100 trees on the provided data my_data.

function.name: random_forest_train
function.description: Train a Random Forest Model on given data

n_estimators.description: The number of trees in the forest.

max_depth.description: The maximum depth of the tree.

data.description: The training data for the model.

messages.content: Predict the price of the house in San Francisco with 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms.

function.name: predict_house_price
function.description: Predict the price of a house in a given area based on number of bedrooms, bathrooms and area.

bedrooms.description: The number of bedrooms in the house.

bathrooms.description: The number of bathrooms in the house.

area.description: The area of the house in square feet.

location.description: The location of the house in the format of city name.

messages.content: "Calculate the Body Mass Index (BMI) of a person with a weight of 85 kilograms.

function.name: calculate_bmi
function.description: Calculate the Body Mass Index (BMI) of a person.

weight.description: Weight of the person in kilograms.

height.description: Height of the person in centimeters.

unit.description: Optional parameter to choose between 'imperial' and 'metric' systems. Default is 'metric'.

messages.content: Calculate the probability of getting exactly 5 heads in a fair coin toss.

function.name: calculate_binomial_probability
function.description: Calculates the binomial probability given the number of trials, successes and the probability of success on an individual trial.

number_of_successes.description: The desired number of successful outcomes.

probability_of_success.description: The probability of a successful outcome on any given trial.

messages.content: Find the probability of getting exactly 5 heads in fair coin tosses.

function.name: prob_dist_binomial
function.description: Compute the probability of having 'success' outcome from binomial distribution.

p.description: The probability of success on any given trial, defaults to 0.5

messages.content: Perform a two-sample t-test on my experiment data of Treated [18, 16, 17, 20, 22] group with alpha equals to 0.05.

function.name: stats_t_test
function.description: Perform a two-sample t-test for two given arrays.

messages.content: Perform a hypothesis test for two independent samples with scores of Sample1: [22,33,42,12,34] at a significance level of 0.05.

function.name: hypothesis_testing_ttest_ind
function.description: Conducts a hypothesis test for two independent samples.

sample1.description: First set of observations (array of numbers).

sample2.description: Second set of observations (array of numbers).

messages.content: Predict house price in San Francisco based on its number of rooms as 5 and year of construction is 1990.

function.name: predict_house_price
function.description: Predict house price based on area, number of rooms and year of construction.

area.description: Area of the house in square feet.

rooms.description: Number of rooms in the house.

year.description: Year when the house was constructed.

location.description: The location or city of the house.

messages.content: What is the coefficient of determination (R-squared) for a model using engine size and fuel economy variables to predict car_price?

function.name: linear_regression_get_r_squared
function.description: Calculate the coefficient of determination of a regression model.

dataset_path.description: Path to the CSV dataset file.

independent_variables.description: The independent variables to use in the regression model.

dependent_variable.description: The dependent variable to predict in the regression model.
